27 Cat Tattoos That Will Leave You Craving More Ink

January 20, 2021 by Koray Musluer 0 Comments

Good To Know
Share on Facebook
Share on Twitter
Share on Pinterest
Share on LinkedIn

As cat lovers, we see felines as the living pieces of art they are, glimpsing in them the muse for creative projects in all medias. From paint to prose, cats provide inspirations unending. This holds true for the art of tattoo as well, and what better subject than a cat to fill a canvas of skin?

If you love the tattoo life and just can’t get enough ink, look to your cat for revelation regarding your next piece. Feline fans will often tell you they got their cat-inspired tattoos thanks to the impact cats have made on their lives.


Your cat is one of a kind, just like you and your imagination. Anything your unique mind’s eye can envision, a tattoo artist can make a reality. Want to get a funny feline forever inked? Great! How about watercolor? Or geometric? Cool, either of those would be fantastic. A purrfect portrait to honor your best friend? Absolutely touching.

Have a look at these cat-inspired tattoos to see where imagination took these cat lovers!


Cat Tattoos That Will Leave You Craving More Ink

A sketch-style portrait of a snaggle-toothed sweetie…


@hajnalka.szabo/Instagram

A portrait tattoo of Atlas the cat and his favorite things…


@crappy_name/Instagram

Marilyn furever, a purrfect portrait…


Chronic Ink Tattoo Shops/Facebook


An intricate line portrait creates deep impact on the emotions…


@flanlo/Instagram

Double vision! Two cat tattoos in one…


@thegallery_tattoo/Instagram

Here’s an Avocat to capture the fun side of a one-eyed cat called Avocado!


@toothboytattoos/Instagram


Neo-traditional flowers and felines are always nice…


@inkformed/Instagram

Here’s another jewel among the blooms…


@pliszkamagdalena/Instagram

A cute and captivating feline bouquet…


@fortyonetattoo/Instagram


This geometric cat tattoo looks amazing from all angles…


@kittytattoos/Instagram

Whimsically wonderful in watercolor!


@yuveza/Instagram

Dreaming in watercolors…


Controse/Facebook 


Purrmaids make for magical tattoos, especially when they’re caticorns too!


@kittytattoos/Instagram

Cat lover Molly immortalized her cat as a cute purrmaid!


@makayla.tattoo/Instagram

Cats certainly think themselves divine and a tattooed cat lover honors this with ink…


@emy_blacksheep/Instagram


This queenly tortie cat tattoo proves felines wear royalty well…


@lucaskvg/Instagram

Something says the cat behind this tattoo really knows how to belt out a tune…


Tattoos and Tattoo Art/Facebook

And sometimes cat tattoos are just fun…


@sailorselkies/Instagram


And totally cute!


@tattoo_lusaiyajin/Instagram

Cat tattoos can be minimal and still say a lot…


@brujas.tattoos/Instagram

An all-black minimal concept makes a beautiful statement of remembrance…


@jipsyrose/Instagram


Why stop at one cat when you can ink the whole squad!


@chincol.tattoo/Instagram

Kittens make good subjects for tattoos too!


@mammothamerican/Instagram

And then there are the famous cat characters which inspire plenty of tattoos, like the Aristocats…


@disneytatts/Instagram


Nyan Cat takes a delightfully dark turn…


Nyan Cat/Facebook

And don’t forget, cats and space pair nicely in ink…


@esoterictattoos/Instagram

Remember, a cat tattoo can be anything your mind dreams to life, including felines playing on a moonlit beach before taking a ride through the stars in a flying saucer!


Chompoonut Huayhongthong/Facebook


With these visions and cat love in your heart, let your creativity unfurl and imagine your purrfect cat tattoo!

Please SHARE to pass on this story to a friend or family member.
